page.description: Cause a sizable dialog to be resized - width or height of -1 means keep old size for width or height.
page.syntax: V UI_DLG_RESIZE(C title,Width as N,Height as N)

argument.name: title
argument.description: The name of the dialog box.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: The new width of the dialog box.

argument.name: Height
argument.description: The new height of the dialog box.

page.discussion: The UI_DLG_RESIZE() function resizes a modeless dialog box.
